description:
A configurable Windows status bar.

A configurable Windows status bar.
New Features
- add threading and opacity effect for wallpaper change 
Refactors
- Improve event handling in WhkdWidget's show_popup method 
- Add support for running commands after changing wallpaper 
- Improve style updating in bar.py 
- Remove unused CLASS_NAME variable in BatteryWidget and MemoryWidget 
- update widget styles to use container class 
- Update WindowShellDialog to display log timestamps 
- Add WiFi widget documentation 
- Update WiFi widget documentation 
- Update WifiWidget to use NetworkInformation API for retrieving wifi information  This should fix problem with latest 24H2 update.
Chores
- remove duplicate CSS class for battery widget 
Other Changes
- Adding pywal section to Wallpaper Widget Docs 
- Merge pull request #52 by ArtyWaBe from ArtyWaBe/pywaldoc 
What's Changed
- Adding pywal section to Wallpaper Widget Docs by @ArtyWaBe in #52
New Contributors
- @ArtyWaBe made their first contribution in #52
Full Changelog: https://github.com/amnweb/yasb/compare/v1.2.6...v1.2.7
